query: What is the percentage of users interested in Leonardo DiCaprio movies with an IMDb rating lower than 9?

tool_plan.note: To get the IDs of movies starring Leonardo DiCaprio and with an IMDb rating lower than 9.
To compute the percentage of users that like movies starring Leonardo DiCaprio and with an IMDb rating lower than 9.

arguments.items: <Python list of item IDs returned by the item_filter_tool>
